name: Baseball Warrior 2072
description:
Frankie Martinez is the last soldier standing in the 54th Battle Bat Batallion of the Anti-Missile Special Operations Wing of the Second United People's Republic of America (SUPRA) Sports Force. She is America's last hope, behind her is the Weiss House, the last bastion of freedom on American soil. Looming in the distance, she sees an uncountable number of Super Nazi Pitcher tanks capable of shooting killer baseballs at tremendous speeds.

But behind all of them, farther on in the distance, is the legendarily formidable MKII Gretchen die Grosse, a supertank piloted by the reincarnated, cybernetic Super Nazi Fuhrer, Cyborg Hitler himself. Frankie looks to avenge her father, who was killed in the Third Baseball War by the original Gretchen die Grosse after misstepping by mere inches.

Do you have what it takes to defeat the Super Nazis and save America? Only the strong will survive.

Play ball!

Made by AZBZ Games,

Discord @aZalea baiZe#8737

Solo entry
